name: @cf/meta/m2m100-1.2b
description: Multilingual encoder-decoder (seq-to-seq) model trained for Many-to-Many multilingual translation

task.name: Translation
task.description: Translation models convert a sequence of text from one language to another.

properties.value: english, chinese, french, spanish, arabic, russian, german, japanese, portuguese, hindi

source_lang.description: The language code of the source text (e.g., 'en' for English). Defaults to 'en' if not specified

target_lang.description: The language code to translate the text into (e.g., 'es' for Spanish)

translated_text.description: The translated text in the target language
